channel.title: ::kdr
channel.description: Hello, players on my server (317 delta) are requesting ::kdr command. Please, does anyone have to code?

item.title: ::kdr
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

add this in commands: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kdr")) { double KDR = ((double)KC)/((double)DC); sM("My Kill/Death ratio is "+KC+"/"+DC+"; "+KDR+"."); } Declare KC & DC - Player.java

Find : public int Adding Saving Stuff - Client.java

Search “character-bow” and add below. } else if (token.equals("character-KC")) { KC = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-DC")) { DC = Integer.parseInt(token2); }Still In Client.java

Put This In the saveGame boolean In character part characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-KC = ", 0, 15); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(KC), 0, Integer.toString(KC).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-DC = ", 0, 15); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(DC), 0, Integer.toString(DC).length());Finally still in the same class

Find : // If killed dead if (deathStage == 1) {Add This before the bracket “}”:DC++;Scroll down until you seeclient killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];and underkillerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+".");addkillerz.KC++;Compile & Run
All creds to: sageofmali, Try and use the search bar next time…

Read full topic
